AI Transport Environment - Visualization Example

Scenario: Random 2D transport network with 10 nodes and 34 edges

Agents: 4 humans (red dots) and 2 vehicles (blue rectangles)

Current Step: Departing (agents can move from nodes to edges)

Visual Legend:

Light Blue Circles: Network nodes with IDs
Gray Arrows: Roads (single arrow = unidirectional, two parallel arrows = bidirectional)
Blue Rectangles: Vehicles
Red Dots: Humans (not visible if aboard a vehicle)
Dashed Blue Lines: Vehicle destinations

Key Features:

  • Network layout uses actual 2D coordinates from Delaunay triangulation
  • Bidirectional roads shown with two separate parallel arrows
  • Vehicles display their destinations with dashed lines
  • Humans aboard vehicles are hidden (not shown separately)
  • Title shows real-time and current step type
